definitions.definition: To steal from, especially using force or violence.
definitions.example: He robbed three banks before he was caught.

definitions.definition: To deprive of, or withhold from, unjustly or injuriously; to defraud.
definitions.example: The best way to rob a bank is to own one.
Working all day robs me of any energy to go out in the evening.

definitions.definition: To take possession of the ball, puck etc. from.
